name: Island Fish
description:
Island Fish is a fishing collection prototype. There are eight different fish to be caught from multiple bodies of water, with each fish having its own unique stats. You must find bait worms along the coast in order to fish. The end goal is to catch every fish at its max size (trackable info in the player's journal).

All progression can be saved and loaded (via JSON).

*NOTE: This was developed strictly as a prototype in order to learn how to make a more comprehensive project. There will be no further development or updates.

CONTROLS:

  • Movement: WASD/Mouse.
  • Sprint: Shift.
  • Open/Close Journal: J.
  • Open/Close Menu: Escape.
  • Pick Up Worms: E.
  • Engage/Exit Fishing Mode: Tab.
  • Casting: Hold down Spacebar and release.
  • Catch Fish: Press 'E' when you hear/see water splashing. You may need to be quick!

There is partial gamepad/controller support.
